mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE user_phone= #{userPhone} limit 1
SELECT id AS id, user_name AS userName, user_phone AS userPhone, create_time AS createTime, modify_time AS modifyTime, score FROM t_user ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (id, user_name, user_phone, create_time, modify_time, score) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{score})
